member.name: IPlayToControlWithCapabilities.GetCapabilities
member.summary: Gets the capabilities information for the content.
member.param: The capabilities information for the content.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPlayToControlWithCapabilities
member.summary: Provides functionality for the to determine the capabilities of the content.
